meanings.definition: Say something again or a number of times.
meanings.sent1: She kept reiterating the same instructions until everyone understood.
meanings.sent2: I will reiterate my point to make sure it is clear.
meanings.sent3: The parrot was reiterating the words in a funny voice.
meanings.sent4: His actions were reiterating his commitment to the cause.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's reiterating of the lesson made it stick in my mind.

meanings.sent1: He was reiterating the melody on his guitar all day.
meanings.sent2: Please reiterate the message to the team for me.
meanings.sent3: The broken record player kept reiterating the same note.
meanings.sent4: The echoes in the canyon were reiterating his voice.
meanings.sent5: The drumbeat was reiterating throughout the entire song.
